sentences.en: Aberrant internal carotid artery is a rare situation which may cause retropharyngeal space enlargement.
sentences.cn: 摘要内颈动脉异常路径是一种引起后咽部肿大的罕见原因.

sentences.en: Aberrant larvae may lodge in the liver, producing granulomatous lesions and hepatomegaly.
sentences.cn: 蛔蚴可误入肝门, 引起肉芽肿性损害及肝肿大.

sentences.en: Chromosome aberrant and some gene mutations play an important role in male infertility.
sentences.cn: 染色体畸变和基因突变在男性不育中起着重要作用.

sentences.en: Conclusion: Over - expression of Smad 7 may contribute to formation of aberrant hyperplastic epidermis in seborrheic keratosis.
sentences.cn: 结论: 脂溢性角化病皮损表皮中Smad7过度表达可能有助于表皮细胞的异常增生,促进脂溢性角化病的形成.

sentences.en: His aberrant behavior at the party shocked everyone.
sentences.cn: 他在晚会上的异常举止令所有人感到震惊!

sentences.en: I saw that the insects and spiders were displaying the same kind of aberrant behavior.
sentences.cn: 我看到昆虫和蜘蛛正在表现出相同反常的行为.

sentences.en: Ian's rages and aberrant behavior worsened.
sentences.cn: 伊恩的怒气越来越大，反常行为也愈发恶劣。

sentences.en: Objective To explore the mechanism of enalapril for inversing aberrant hemorrheology and micro - circulation in essential hypertension.
sentences.cn: 目的观察马来酸依那普利逆转高血压病患者异常血流变学及微循环的作用.

sentences.en: Previously aberrant and very few, now at every turn thousands of mixed aberrant.
sentences.cn: 以前的变体很少, 现在动辄成百上千的形形色色的变体.

sentences.en: Regulations are changed on a whim, resulting in aberrant results that distort long - established competitive values.
sentences.cn: 规则可以因为一时的兴致而改变, 造成的异常结果扭曲了确立已久的竞争价值观.

sentences.en: The markets'extraordinarily low expected inflation in January was aberrant and worrisome - not today's.
sentences.cn: 较之今天,市场利率一月份令人心焦的狂泻绝非常态.

sentences.en: The white peafowl is the albino aberrant form of the blue peafowl.
sentences.cn: 白孔雀则是蓝孔雀的白化变种.

sentences.en: When bradycardia aberrant conduction, and premature beats are present, hypoxia and hypoperfusion should be suspected immediately.
sentences.cn: 当存在心动过缓、差异传导和期前收缩时, 应该马上考虑到缺氧和灌注不足的可能.

sentences.en: You Are Also Not Having an Aberrant personality.
sentences.cn: 你也不是白痴说的大变态.

words.tran_cn: 变异；越轨；反常；偏离常轨
脱离正道，偏离常轨；反常
离开正路的,脱离常轨的

trans.tran_cn: 离开正路的，与正确（或真实情况）相背的，<生物>异常的，畸变的
